entension.block-service.downloadBlock.ge: Failed to obtain url, please copy and open <%= _repository %> in browse.
entension.block-service.downloadBlock.un: Error in unzipping <%= _blockName %>，please copy and download from this url: ：<%= _tarballURL %>
entension.block-service.downloadBlock.do: Block <%= _blockName %> download timeout, please copy and download from this url: ：<%= _tarballURL %>
entension.block-service.downloadError: Failed to obtain zips from <%= _blockSourceNpm %> ，try to clone the <%= _repository %> repository manually.
entension.block-service.templateError: You can only add block codes to  <%= _jsxFileExtnames %>
entension.block-service.notPageFileError: You can only add block codes to files in <%= _pagesPath %>
entension.block-service.obtainDone: > The block code has been downloaded to <%= _blockDir %>
